Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naindriya
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naindriya
45.
240Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naindriyapaccayā—  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā…pe…  mahābhūte paṭicca upādārūpaṃ; asaññasattānaṃ mahābhūte paṭicca rūpajīvitindriyaṃ. (1)
<< Naāhāraup Najhāna >>
